name: llama-vscode
description: Local LLM-assisted text completion using llama.cpp

commands.title: llama-vscode: Edit Selected Text with AI

llama-vscode.launch_completion.description: Shell command for starting fim llama.cpp server, executed from the menu

llama-vscode.launch_chat.description: Shell command for starting chat llama.cpp server, executed from the menu

llama-vscode.launch_embeddings.description: Shell command for starting chat llama.cpp server, executed from the menu

llama-vscode.launch_training_completion.description: Shell command for starting training a completion (fim) model from the menu

llama-vscode.launch_training_chat.description: Shell command for starting training a chat model from the menu

llama-vscode.lora_completion.description: Path to the lora adapter file for the completion model. If not empty it will be used (appends --lora lora_completion) on starting the completion server with launch_completion

llama-vscode.lora_chat.description: Path to the lora adapter file for the chat model. If not empty it will be used (appends --lora lora_chat) on starting the completion server with launch_chat

llama-vscode.endpoint.description: The URL to be used by the extension for code completion.

llama-vscode.endpoint_chat.description: The URL to be used by the extension for chat with ai.

llama-vscode.endpoint_embeddings.description: The URL to be used by the extension for creating embeddings.

llama-vscode.auto.description: If code completion should be trggered automatically (true) or only by pressing Ctrl+l.

llama-vscode.api_key.description: llama.cpp server api key or OpenAI endpoint API key (optional)

llama-vscode.n_prefix.description: number of lines before the cursor location to include in the local prefix

llama-vscode.n_suffix.description: number of lines after  the cursor location to include in the local suffix

llama-vscode.n_predict.description: max number of tokens to predict

llama-vscode.t_max_prompt_ms.description: max alloted time for the prompt processing (TODO: not yet supported)

llama-vscode.t_max_predict_ms.description: max alloted time for the prediction

llama-vscode.show_info.description: show extra info about the inference (false - disabled, true - show extra info in status line)

llama-vscode.max_line_suffix.description: do not auto-trigger FIM completion if there are more than this number of characters to the right of the cursor

llama-vscode.max_cache_keys.description: max number of cached completions to keep in result_cache

llama-vscode.ring_n_chunks.description: max number of chunks to pass as extra context to the server (0 to disable)

llama-vscode.ring_chunk_size.description: max size of the chunks (in number of lines). Note: adjust these numbers so that you don't overrun your context at ring_n_chunks = 64 and ring_chunk_size = 64 you need ~32k context

llama-vscode.ring_scope.description: the range around the cursor position (in number of lines) for gathering chunks after FIM

llama-vscode.ring_update_ms.description: how often to process queued chunks in normal mode

llama-vscode.rag_chunk_max_chars.description: Max number of chars per RAG chunk

llama-vscode.rag_max_lines_per_chunk.description: Max number of lines per RAG chunk

llama-vscode.rag_max_chars_per_chunk_lin.description: max chars for a chunk line, the rest of the line is cut

llama-vscode.rag_max_chunks.description: max cunks for the RAG search

llama-vscode.rag_max_bm25_filter_chunks.description: max RAG chunks to filter with BM25 algorithm

llama-vscode.rag_max_embedding_filter_ch.description: max RAG chunks to provide as context to the LLM

llama-vscode.rag_max_context_files.description: max number of complete files to send as context to the LLM

llama-vscode.rag_max_context_file_chars.description: max chars for a context file. If the file is bigger it will be cut to avoid too big context.

llama-vscode.language.description: language: bg - Bulgarian (Български), cn - Chinese (中文), en - English, fr - French (Français), de - German (Deutsch), ru - Russian (Русский), es - Spanish (Español)

llama-vscode.use_openai_endpoint.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Use OAI endpoint. Slow and poor quality - avoid using

llama-vscode.openai_client_model.description: The FIM friendly model supported by your OpenAI compatible endpoint to be used (e.g., Qwen2.5-Coder-14B-4-bit)

llama-vscode.openai_prompt_template.description: The prompt template to be used for the OpenAI compatible endpoint.
